rla.name: Combination of two operations with the same addressing mode (Sub-instructions: AND, ROL)

sre.name: Combination of two operations with the same addressing mode (Sub-instructions: EOR, LSR)

rra.name: Combination of two operations with the same addressing mode (Sub-instructions: ADC, ROR)

sax.name: Combination of two operations with the same addressing mode (Sub-instructions: STA, STX)

lax.name: Combination of two operations with the same addressing mode (Sub-instructions: LDA, LDX)

dcp.name: Combination of two operations with the same addressing mode (Sub-instructions: CMP, DEC)

isc.name: Combination of two operations with the same addressing mode (Sub-instructions: SBC, INC)

anc.name: Combination of an immediate and an implied command (Sub-instructions: AND, ASL/ROL)

alr.name: Combination of an immediate and an implied command (Sub-instructions: AND, LSR)

arr.name: Combination of an immediate and an implied command (Sub-instructions: AND, ROR)

sbx.name: Combination of an immediate and an implied command (Sub-instructions: CMP, DEX)
